item.title: Barbarian fly fisher(give me feedback)
item.dc:creator: @i_ancients_i i ancients i
item.description:
@i_ancients_i wrote:

How To Use The Script:
1: Place your players in Edgevile bank.
2: Equip them with fire or water staffs.
3: Declare your players
4: Have w\e amount of your feathers u want in ur inventory.
5: Players[].String1 is eighter Fire or Water. After what staff you use.
6: Run The Script!

[code]{ ----------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:
1: Wear a Fire or Water staff.
2: Then on line ‘27’ Choose eighter Fire, or Water.
3: Have ALL your feathers in ur inventory.
4: Declare your players.
5: Line up ALL your players at Edgeville bank
6: Press RUN!

}

program JuBarianFlyFisher;
{.Include SRL/SRL.Scar}
{.Include SRL/SRL/Skill/Fighting.Scar}

Var
StaffOrb, ClickAgain, FishSymbolColor: Integer;
DTMBankers, DTMWhirlPool, DTMSea, DTMRod, DTMFishEquipMent, DTMFeathers: Integer;
CurrentLoad, Salmons, Trouts, Fished, Banked, Gained: Integer;

Const
HowManyLoads = 5;

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
CurrentPlayer:=0;
NumberOfPlayers(1);

Players[0].Name := ‘’;
Players[0].Pass := ‘’;
Players[0].Nick := ‘’;
Players[0].String1:= ‘Water’; //Water, Or Fire Staff?
Players[0].Active:= true;
end;

Function AutoColorOrb(ArgueMent: String): Integer;
Var
Toleran: Integer;
Begin

Case ArgueMent Of
‘Water’: Begin
Repeat
Wait(50);
If(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,15475741, 215, 140, 298, 209, Toleran))Then
Begin
Result:= GetColor(x,y);
End Else
Begin
Toleran:= Toleran + 2;
If(Toleran > 50)Then
Begin
Break;
End;
End;
Until(Result > 1)
End;
‘Fire’ : Begin
Repeat
Wait(50);
If(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,1913582, 215, 140, 298, 209, Toleran))Then
Begin
Result:= GetColor(x,y);
End Else
Begin
Toleran:= Toleran + 2;
If(Toleran > 50)Then
Begin
Break;
End;
End;
Until(Result> 1);
End;
End;

If(Result = 0)Then
Begin
Writeln(‘Couldnt Find Staff Color, Logging Out.’);
Logout
End Else
Begin
Writeln('Staff Color: ’ + inttostr(result));
End;
End;

Function WaitR(Time : Integer) : Boolean;
Var Time1: Integer;
Begin
Marktime(time1)
Repeat
Wait(50);
If(FindTalk)Then
Result := True;
Until(result)or(TimeFromMark(Time1)>Time);
End;

procedure HandleWhirlPool;
begin
DTMWhirlPool := DTMFromString(‘78DA63D4606460B8C380024E9EBAC02002A41’ +
‘9A17C466D20EB16AA9A03BBF7A2AA5107B29EA1AAD9B46D27AA1A’ +
‘6320EB36AA9A43474EA2AA5105B2EEA1AA397FE1128A1A001C7C1’ +
‘117’);
if(FindDTM(DTMWhirlPool,x,y,MSX1,MSY1,MSX2,MSY2))Then
begin
Status(‘Whirlpool found!’);
WhirlPools := WhirlPools + 1;
Mouse(647, 82, 2, 2, True);
FTWait(50 + Random(15));
Repeat
HoverSkill(‘fishing’, False);
If(Not LoggedIn)Then Break;
FTWait(2 + Random(2));
Until(Not FindDTM(DTMWhirlPool,x,y,MSX1,MSY1,MSX2,MSY2));
ClickAgain:= ClickAgain + 100000;
end;
FreeDTM(DTMWhirlPool);
end;

Function FindFastRandoms: Boolean; //by WT-Fakawi
var
i: Integer;
begin
for i:=1 to 9 do
begin
case I of
1: If FindDead then
Result := True;
2: If FindMod then
Result := True;
3: If FindMime then
Result := True;
4: If FindMaze then
Result := True;
5: If FindQuiz then
Result := True;
6: If FindDemon then
Result := True;
7: begin
if NoGameTab then
begin
Result := True;
Players[CurrentPlayer].loc := ‘No GameTab’;
Logout;
Exit;
end;
end;
8: begin
if InBlack then
begin
Result := True;
Players[CurrentPlayer].loc := ‘InBlack’;
Logout;
Exit;
end;
end;
9: RC;
end;
wait(1);
end;
end;

Procedure AntiRandoms;
begin
if infight then
begin
RunAwayDirection(‘W’);
Wait(5000+Random(3500));
RunBack;
end;
FindFastRandoms;
wait(5)
UseBoxSolver := True
UseCerterSolver := True
UseSandwichSolver := True
FindMaze;
wait(5)
Solvepinball;
wait(5)
TalkToRand;
wait(5)
if (FindQuiz) then
SolveQuiz;
FindNormalRandoms;
end;

Procedure TheAntiBan;
Var
Rand: Integer;
Begin
Case 1+Random(20) Of
1: HoverSkill(‘Random’,False);
2: HoverSkill(‘Fishing’,False);
3: MMouse(Random(MIX2),Random(MIY2),1,5)
4: Begin
GameTab(1+Random(12));
Wait(500+Random(1000));
GameTab(4);
End;
5: PickUpMouse;
6: Begin
Rand:= 3+Random(14);
If(ExistsItem(Rand))Then
DragItem(Rand, 4+Random(18));
End;
End;
End;

procedure Setup;
begin
Cleardebug;
Writeln(‘Successfully compiled’);
SetupSRL;
DeclarePlayers;
ActivateClient;
Wait(1000)
If(Not Loggedin)Then LoginPlayer;
end;

procedure SetCompass(Direction: String);
var
Angle,DirectionDeg: Extended;
key:integer;
begin
case 1+random(2) of
1: key := 3;
2: key := 1;
end
wait(100+random(50));
KeyDown(VK_RIGHT)
case Direction of
‘n’: DirectionDeg := 0;
‘w’: DirectionDeg := 90;
‘e’: DirectionDeg := 270;
‘s’: DirectionDeg := 180;
end
repeat
if not loggedin then break;
Angle:= rs_GetCompassAngleDegrees;
wait(1);
until(Angle = DirectionDeg);
KeyUp(VK_Right)
end;

procedure Autoretaliate(act : boolean);
begin
Gametab(1)
if FindColorTolerance(x,y,2106255,580, 364,715, 394, 10)then
begin
if not act then
mouse(657, 376,30,10,true)
end else
begin
if act then
mouse(657, 376,30,10,true)
end;
end;

Procedure InitPlayer;
Begin
If(Not Loggedin)Then Exit;
SetCompass(‘n’);
StaffOrb:= AutoColorOrb(Players[CurrentPlayer].String1);
Autoretaliate(False);
WaterColor := FindWaterColor;
End;

{*******************************************************************************
function WaterWalk(StartRadial, EndRadial: Integer; Radius, FFlagBreakOut: Integer; Xoff, Yoff, Xmod, Ymod: Integer): Boolean;
By: By Wizzup? and WT-Fakawi and modified by Ron And again edited by jukka
Description: Walks alongside Water.
*******************************************************************************}

function WaterWalk2(StartRadial, EndRadial: Integer; Radius,
FFlagBreakOut: Integer; Xoff, Yoff, Xmod, Ymod: Integer): Boolean;
var
i, X1, Y1: Integer;
begin
Result := False;
if(StartRadial = EndRadial)then
WriteLn(‘ERROR - WaterWalk can’‘t have the same values for both Start and End Radials!’)
else if (StartRadial < EndRadial) then
begin
repeat
for i := StartRadial to EndRadial do
begin
x1 := Round(Radius * Sine(i)) + 646;
y1 := Round(-Radius * Cose(i)) + 84;
if FindColor(x, y, WaterColor, X1, Y1, X1 + 1, Y1 + 1) then
begin
Mouse(x + Xoff, y + Yoff, Xmod, Ymod,True);
Result := True;
FFlag(FFlagBreakOut);
Exit;
end;
end;
Radius := Radius - 4;
until Radius <= 1;
end else
if (StartRadial > EndRadial) then
begin
repeat
for i := StartRadial downto EndRadial do
begin
x1 := Round(Radius * Sine(i)) + 646;
y1 := Round(-Radius * Cose(i)) + 84;
if (FindColor(x, y, WaterColor, X1, Y1, X1 + 1, Y1 + 1)) then
begin
Mouse(x + Xoff, y + Yoff, Xmod, Ymod,True);
Result := True;
FFlag(FFlagBreakOut);
Exit;
end;
end;
Radius := Radius - 4;
until Radius <= 1;
end;
end;

Procedure GoToFishSpot;
Var
OldFishColor, Radie1, Radie2: Integer;
Begin
If(Not Loggedin)Then Exit;
If(InvFull)Then Exit;

FindFastRandoms;
If(RadialWalk(WaterColor, 173, 142, 60, -1, 0))Then
Begin
MarkTime(Mark);
Radie1:= 190;
Radie2:= 165;
Repeat

      If(Not WaterWalk2(Radie1,Radie2,30+Random(15),5,-10,0,0,0))Then
        Begin
          Radie1:= Radie1 + 20;
          FindFastRandoms;
          Radie2:= Radie2 - 20;
        End;
      WaitR(150+Random(150));

      If(FindSymbol(x,y,'fish'))Then
        Begin
          OldFishColor:= FishSymbolColor;
          FishSymbolColor := GetSymbolColor(x,y,'fish');
          If(Not OldFishColor = FishSymbolColor)Then
            Writeln('Fish Symbol Color: ' + inttostr(FishSymbolColor));
          FindMMColor(x,y,FishSymbolColor);
          Mouse(x,y,5,5,True);
          Flag;
          Break;
        End;
      FindFastRandoms;
      If(TimeFromMark(Mark)>90000)Then
        Begin
          Logout;
          Break;
        End;
    Until(Not Loggedin);
End;

End;

Function GotFeathers: Boolean;
Begin
If(Not Loggedin)Then Exit;
FindFastRandoms;
DTMFeathers := DTMFromString(‘78DA632C62626078C58006189148209D0754F’ +
‘39E809A1CA09A7704D46403D53C25A0A600A8E63E01359540350F’ +
‘70AB6101D11540352FF0AB01003EA20997’);
GameTab(4);
If(FindDTM(DTMFeathers,x,y,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2))Then
Result := True;
FindFastRandoms;
FreeDTM(DTMFeathers);
End;

Function GotFishingEquipMent: Boolean;
Begin
If(Not Loggedin)Then Exit;
FindFastRandoms;
DTMFishEquipMent := DTMFromString(‘78DA637466626078C6800618914820ED02547’ +
‘39F801A47A09A2704D45803D5BC21A0C60EA8E63D01354E40351F’ +
‘09A87105AA794D408D0750CD73026ABC806A1E1350E30354F3808’ +
‘01A7FA09A5BF8D50000C5CB0D11’);
GameTab(4);
If(FindDTM(DTMFishEquipMent,x,y,MIX1,MIY1,MIX2,MIY2))Then
Result := True;
FindFastRandoms;
FreeDTM(DTMFishEquipMent);
End;

Function FindBankers: Boolean;
var
a: Extended;
Begin
DTMBankers := DTMFromString(‘78DA632C67626050634001FFFE09334802694’ +
‘620FE0F048C154035CAA86AFEFC6182AB0101B01A7DDC6A401800’ +
‘F4710C37’);

If(FindDTMRotated(DTMBankers,x,y,MMX1,MMY1,MMX2,MMY2,0,360,0.1, a))Then
Result:= True;

FreeDTM(DTMBankers);
End;

Procedure GoToEdgeBank;
Var
Radie1, Radie2: Integer;
Begin
If(Not Loggedin)Then Exit;
FindFastRandoms;
Radie1:= 380;
Radie2:= 336;
WaterWalk(Radie1,Radie2,55,10,-10,0,0,0)
MarkTime(Mark);
Repeat
FindFastRandoms;

  If(Not WaterWalk2(Radie1,Radie2,25+Random(30),10,-10,0,0,0))Then
    Begin
      Radie1:= Radie1 - 20;
      Radie2:= Radie2 + 20;
    End;

  If(FindBankers)Then
    Begin
      Mouse(x-10,y,3,5,True);
      Flag;
      Break;
    End;

  FindFastRandoms;
  If(TimeFromMark(Mark)>90000)Then
    Begin
      Logout;
      Break;
    End;
Until(Not Loggedin);

End;

Procedure ProgressReport;
Begin
Writeln(’’{Made by Jukka});
Writeln(’============= Progress Report ============’);
Writeln(’= Worked: ’ + TimeRunning);
Writeln(’= Fished: ’ + IntToStr(Fished) + ’ Salmons&Trouts’);
Writeln(’= Banked: ’ + IntToStr(Banked) + ’ Loads’);
Writeln(’= Gained: ’ + IntToStr(Gained) + ’ Exp’);
End;

Function PlayerCheck: Integer;
begin
If HowManyPlayers = 1 Then
Result:= HowManyPlayers
Else
Result:= HowManyPlayers - 1;
End;

Procedure PlayersReport;
Var
I: Integer;
Begin
Players[CurrentPlayer].Integer3:= Players[CurrentPlayer].Integer1 * 60;

Writeln(’============= Players Report =============’);
Writeln(’= Currentplayer: ’ + IntToStr(CurrentPlayer) + ‘’);
Writeln(’= Player Name : ’ + Players[CurrentPlayer].Name);
Writeln(’= Fished: ’ + IntToStr(Players[CurrentPlayer].Integer1) + ’ Salmons&Trouts’);
Writeln(’= Banked: ’ + IntToStr(Players[CurrentPlayer].Integer2) + ’ Loads’);
Writeln(’= Gained: ’ + IntToStr(Players[CurrentPlayer].Integer3) + ’ Exp.’);
Writeln(’==========================================’);
Writeln(’’);
End;

Function IsFishing: Boolean;
Begin
If(Not Loggedin)Then Exit;

WaitR(150+Random(150));

If(Not FindColorSpiral(x,y,StaffOrb, 231, 133, 316, 194))Then
Begin
Result:= True;
If(IsUpText(‘ure’))Then MMouse(Random(MSX2),Random(MSY2),100,100);
Wait(100+Random(100));
TheAntiBan;
End;
HandleWhirlPool;
WaitR(150+Random(150));
End;

Procedure ChangeSpot;
Var
MMBox: TBox;
Begin
If(Not Loggedin)Then Exit;
FindFastRandoms;
MMBox.X1:= 618;
MMBox.Y1:= 58;
MMBox.X2:= 668;
MMBox.Y2:= 95;

If(FindColorSkipBox(x,y,FishSymbolColor,MMX1,MMY1,MMX2,MMY2,MMBox))Then
Begin
Mouse(x,y,5,5,true);
Flag;
ClickAgain:= ClickAgain + 100000;
End Else
Begin
Logout;
End;
End;

function FindHole : Boolean; //Dank
var CX, CY : Integer;
begin
DTMSea := DTMFromstring(‘78DA63FCC4C0C070910105CC38F086410E483’ +
‘342F98C1F31D5E4B52C4255F399083520BB2E10A1E6127E3500EE’ +
‘831204’);
If(FindDTM(DTMSea,CX,CY,MSX1,MSY1,MSX2,MSY2))Then
Begin
MMouse(CX,CY,5,5);
Wait(50);
If(IsUpText(‘Lure’))Then
Begin
Result:= true;
End;
End;
FreeDTM(DTMSea)
End;

Procedure FishTheFishes;
Begin
If(Not Loggedin)Then Exit;
If(Invfull)Then Exit;

AntiRandoms;
WaitR(150+Random(150));
If(FindHole)Then
Begin
HandleWhirlPool;
GetMousePos(x,y)
Mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
Marktime(ClickAgain);
FindFastRandoms;
Flag;
FindFastRandoms;
End Else
Begin
ChangeSpot;
End;
WaitR(150+Random(150));
End;

Function LoadsDone: Boolean;
Begin
If(CurrentLoad >= HowManyLoads)Then
Result := True;
End;

Function InBankScreen: Boolean;
Begin
Result := IsTextAtEx(184, 34, ‘The Bank of’, 30, upchars, True, False, 0, 0, -1);
End;

Function OpenBankGlassSlow: Boolean;
Var
Tol: Integer;
Begin
Repeat
Wait(500+Random(250));

If(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,7631222,MSX1,MSY1,MSX2,MSY2,Tol))Or
  (FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,7432558,MSX1,MSY1,MSX2,MSY2,Tol))Or
  ( FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,539727,MSX1,MSY1,MSX2,MSY2,Tol))Or
  (FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,7894394,MSX1,MSY1,MSX2,MSY2,Tol))Then
    Begin
      MMouse(x,y+Random(5),0,0)
      Wait(50);
      If(IsUpText('ooth'))Then
        Begin
          Getmousepos(x,y)
          Mouse(x,y,0,0,false);
          Wait(50);
          Result:= Chooseoption(x,y,'uickly');
          Flag;
          Wait(500+Random(250));
        End Else
          Begin
            Tol:= Tol + 2;
          End;
    End Else
      Begin
        Tol:= Tol + 2;
      End;

Until(InBankScreen)or(Not Loggedin);
End;

Function EasyBank: Boolean;
Begin
If(Not LOggedin)Then Exit;
SetCompass(‘w’);
If(OpenBankGlassSlow)Then
Wait(1000);
FFlag(0);
If(InBankScreen)Then
begin
Result := True;
End;
If(Not Result)Then
Begin
Logout;
Writeln(‘Couldnt Find bank.’);
End;
End;

function CountItemColorTol(color, tol: Integer): Integer;
var
used, i, e: Integer;
begin
GameTab(4);
while (i < 6) do
begin
if (i = 5) and (e < 8) then
begin
i := 0;
e := e + 1;
end;
if (FindColorTolerance(x, y, color, (570 + 39 * i), (214 + 35 * e), (609 + 39
* i), (249 + 35 * e), tol)) then
used := used + 1;
i := i + 1;
end;
Result := used;
end;

procedure CountFishes;
begin
Salmons := CountItemColorTol(8228051,5)
Trouts:= CountItemColorTol(12105921,5)
end;

Procedure DoTheMath;
Begin
CountFishes;

Fished:= Fished + Trouts + Salmons;
Gained:= (Trouts * 50) + (Salmons * 70) + Gained;
Banked:= Banked + 1;

Players[CurrentPlayer].Integer1:= Players[CurrentPlayer].Integer1 + Trouts + Salmons;
Players[CurrentPlayer].Integer2:= Players[CurrentPlayer].Integer2 + 1;
Players[CurrentPlayer].Integer3:= Players[CurrentPlayer].Integer3 + (Trouts * 50) + (Salmons * 70);

Salmons:= 0;
Trouts:= 0;
End;

procedure Deposit2(FromItem,ToItem: integer);
var
i : integer;
var
aPoint: TPoint;
begin
I := Fromitem;
for I := FromItem to ToItem do
begin
if existsitem(I)then
begin
aPoint := ItemCoords(i);
Mouse(aPoint.x + 5, aPoint.y, 0, 0, false);
Wait(10);
Chooseoption(x,y,‘All’);
Wait(300+random(500));
end;
end;
end;

Procedure HandleBanking;
Begin
If(Not Loggedin)Then Exit;
DoTheMath;
Flag;
Wait(1000+random(1000));
If(EasyBank)Then
Begin
Deposit2(3,28);
CurrentLoad:= CurrentLoad + 1;
CloseBank;
SetCompass(‘n’);
End;
End;

Function NoMoreActivePlayers: Boolean;
Var
I, PlayersFalse: Integer;
Begin
For I:= 0 To HowManyPlayers - 1 Do
Begin
If(Not Players[i].Active)Then
PlayersFalse:= PlayersFalse + 1;

  If(PlayersFalse = HowManyPlayers - 1)Then
    Result:= True;
End;

End;

Begin
Setup;
Repeat
InitPlayer;
Repeat
GoToFishSpot;
FishTheFishes;
Repeat
If(Not Loggedin)Then Break;
If(Not IsFishing)Then
FishTheFishes;
Until(InvFull)Or(Not GotFeathers)Or(Not GotFishingEquipMent);
GoToEdgeBank;
HandleBanking;
Until(LoadsDone)Or(Not Loggedin);
ProgressReport;
PlayersReport;
If(Loggedin)Then NextPlayer(True)
Else
Begin
Players[CurrentPlayer].Active:= False;
If(NoMoreActivePlayers)Then Exit;
NextPlayer(False);
End;
Until(NoMoreActivePlayers);
ProgressReport;
PlayersReport;
End.{Script Made by:I ancients i}
[/code]

Read full topic
